name: Memory Mountain
description:
Alzheimers is very serious mental illness where an individual can become completely disconnected from themselves and their loved ones. These individuals struggle to remember nearly any aspect of their lives once the late stages of the illness set in.

Sadly, there is no cure.

We made this game to create awareness for Alzheimers in the hopes that people would be able to understand somewhat of what it is like to have it.

Level Designer & Lead Programmer: Bryn Gilland

Puzzle Designer & Programmer: Christian Jones

Narrative and Audio Designer: Kobi Sonsire

UI Designers: Bryn Gilland and Seth Constant
